alert.note: Alert for Hamilton (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 19 at 2:14AM EST until December 19 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Sacandaga River at Hope. * WHEN...Until this afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 8.0 feet, Water floods NY Route 30 near the Hope town garage. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:01 AM EST Tuesday the stage was 7.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage this morning and continue falling to 4.1 feet early Friday morning. - Flood stage is 7.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Sacandaga River Hope Flood Stage: 7.0 Observed Stage at Tue 2 am: 7.8 Forecast: Tue 7 am 7.0 Tue 1 pm 6.4 Tue 7 pm 5.9 Wed 1 am 5.7 Wed 7 am 5.5 Wed 1 pm 5.3 Wed 7 pm 5.1 Thu 1 am 4.8 Thu 7 am 4.6 Thu 1 pm 4.4 Thu 7 pm 4.3 &&
